entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this afternoon then sunny. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
